ruleSearch.author: .pen_name

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>

sid=java.get('bid');
s=result.match(/page": (.*?)\,/)[1];
qs=result.match(/total_page": (.*?)\,/)[1];
qs=parseInt(qs*1+1)
s=parseInt(s*1+1)

if(s < qs){String(s);
	var ua = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/77.0.3865.120 Safari/537.36";
    var headers = {"User-Agent": ua};
    var body ='{"page_limit":12,"id":'+sid+',"sort":"asc","page":'+s+'}';
    var option = {
        
        "method": "POST",
        "body": String(body),
        "headers": headers,
   
    };
    "https://www.scirym.club/novels/menu," + JSON.stringify(option)
}
</js>
